com.spotify.apollo.route

Interface ListenableFutureHandler<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ListenableFutureHandler<T>
    Asynchronous endpoint handler. Depending on the response type, Apollo will act differently. Return a future to a Response when you want to do things like modify response headers based on results of service invocations or if you want to set the status code. Example: public ListenableFuture> invoke(RequestContext requestContest) { return Futures.transform(futureToStringPayload(), (String s) -> { return Response.forPayload(s) .withHeader("X-Payload-Length", s.length()); }); } Any other return type will be serialized with the configured serializer and added as payload to a response with status Status.OK.
